issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: Currently cartesian product stats based on cardinality of inputs are not inferred correctly.
fields.summary: Improve AnnotateWithStatistics with support for cartesian product

comments.body: [~ashutoshc], could you review this one too? Thanks a lot
+1 I am assuming it probably require updating few other golden files as well.
